title: Journey (A)
creator_credit: Ivan Sen and ABC-TV (Australia). Indigenous Program Unit
brief_description: A twelve year old boy leaves his isolated home town hitchhiking across a forever changing landscape. His travels cause him to relive fragments of the life left behind as he struggles to find rest in a journey that may never end.
